contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of November, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. It is further ordered that the matter be CONSOLIDATED with Tri-County Industries, Inc., et al. v. Department of Environmental Protection, No. 179 MAL 2003, 575 Pa. 163, 164, 835 A.2d 706, 2003 WL 22681332.
